lead_paragraph: Rafael Callejas, the former Honduran president, is expected to plead guilty on Monday in Brooklyn to federal charges that he was involved in bribery schemes at FIFA.

headline.main: Rafael Callejas to Plead Guilty in FIFA Bribery Case

snippet: Rafael Callejas, the former Honduran president, is expected to plead guilty on Monday in Brooklyn to federal charges that he was involved in bribery schemes at FIFA.
abstract: Former Honduran president and soccer official Rafael Callejas is set to plead guilty in Brooklyn court to federal bribery charges in connection with FIFA investigation.
